data.title: Berkshire Interpreters and Translation Services
data.meta_description: Professional translators and interpreter services in Berkshire provided by Bostico International in the UK
data.text:
Order

Home > Interpreters > Berkshire

Berkshire Interpreter Services

We provide professional language interpreter services in Berkshire for all languages. We offer a wide range of Interpreting and Translating solutions in Berkshire to tailor your need where communication in a foreign language is required. Berkshire is one of the oldest in England. It may date from the 840s, the probable period of the unification of "Sunningum" and "Ashdown". The county is first mentioned by name in 860. Located in the South East of England, the county has a major tourism industry. The area is noted for the concentration of performance motorsport companies and facilities. Oxford University Press has headed a concentration of print and publishing firms; the university is also linked to the concentration of local biotechnology companies. Our skilled team combines accreditation from the IOL, ITI and NRPSI to give you the best interpreting services available (conference, police, hospitals, court, business meetings, etc) We can supply an interpreter in the language of your choice. Please note that while we're able to provide interpreter services in Berkshire, we are unable to guarantee your interpreter will be from the local area.

Berkshire Translation Services

Our translators and interpreters can deal with all types of materials such as medical, legal, scientific, academic, etc. Our interpreters are capable of providing both consecutive and simultaneous interpretation.
